input: What is the system of governance in the Panchayati Raj set up?

options.A: Single tier structure of local self govt. at the village level
options.B: Two tier system of local self govt. at the village and block levels.
options.C: Three tier structure of local self govt. at the village, block and district levels.
options.D: Four tier system of local self govt. at the village, block, district and state levels.

explanation: Part IX of the constitution envisages a 3-tier system of panchayats, namely (a) the village level (b) the district panchayat (district-level) (c) The intermediate panchayat (block-level)
